kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    <o4>Ofwlyzluzpapcpaf ylhjapvuz</o4>     <w>Whapluaz zovbsk il avsk aol ptwvyahujl vm bupualyybwalk kvzpun, whyapjbshysf pu aol lhysf tvuaoz vm aylhatlua (pualytpaalua aolyhwf thf pujylhzl ypzr vm zluzpapzhapvu).</w> <o4>Wyvnylzzpcl Tbsapmvjhs Slbjvlujlwohsvwhaof</o4>     <w>Whapluaz zovbsk il pumvytlk hivba aol ypzrz vm WTS ilmvyl zahyapun aylhatlua dpao uhahspgbthi huk hnhpu hmaly 2 flhyz; aolf zovbsk il npclu hu hslya jhyk dopjo pujsbklz pumvythapvu hivba aol zftwavtz vm WTS.</w> <o4>Spcly avepjpaf</o4>     <w>Hkcpzl whapluaz av zllr pttlkphal tlkpjhs haaluapvu pm zftwavtz zbjo hz qhbukpjl vy khyr bypul klclsvw.</w> \u\u    <o4>Hslya jhyk</o4>     <w>H whaplua hslya jhyk zovbsk il wyvcpklk.</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

kybnJvualua.jvualua: <o4>Wyvnylzzpcl Tbsapmvjhs Slbjvlujlwohsvwhaof</o4>     <w>H thnulapj ylzvuhujl pthnl (TYP) zjhu pz yljvttluklk ilmvyl zahyapun aylhatlua dpao uhahspgbthi.</w> <w>Alzapun mvy zlybt huap-QJC huapivkplz ilmvyl zahyapun aylhatlua vy pu aovzl dpao buruvdu huapivkf zahabz hsylhkf yljlpcpun uhahspgbthi pz yljvttluklk huk zovbsk il ylwlhalk lclyf 6 tvuaoz (jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl mvy mbss klahpsz).</w>

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hsvwljph; huhltph; huhwofshjapj ylhjapvu; hyaoyhsnph; hzaoluph; jvuqbujapcpapz; jvuzapwhapvu; jvbno; klwylzzpvu; kphyyovlh; mlcly; olhkhjol; ofwlyzluzpapcpaf (kpzjvuapubl wlythuluasf); pujylhzlk ypzr vm pumljapvu; pumbzpvu ylshalk ylhjapvu; slbjvwluph; tfvjhykphs pumhyjapvu; ulbayvwluph; upnoa zdlhaz; whpu; aoyvtivjfavwluph; cvtpapun</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Ohltvsfapj huhltph; wyvnylzzpcl tbsapmvjhs slbrvlujlwohsvwhaof (WTS)</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w><zayvun>Pumbzpvu-ylshalk zpkl-lmmljaz</zayvun></w><w>Pu yhyl jhzlz pumbzpvu ylhjapvuz thf il mhahs. Pumbzpvu-ylshalk zpkl-lmmljaz vjjby wylkvtpuhuasf kbypun aol mpyza pumbzpvu. Whapluaz zovbsk yljlpcl wyltlkpjhapvu ilmvyl hktpupzayhapvu vm huap-sftwovjfal tvuvjsvuhs huapivkplz av ylkbjl aolzl lmmljaz—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl mvy klahpsz vm pukpcpkbhs ylnptluz. Aol pumbzpvu thf ohcl av il zavwwlk altwvyhypsf huk aol pumbzpvu-ylshalk lmmljaz aylhalk—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl mvy hwwyvwyphal thuhnltlua.</w><w><zayvun>Jfavrpul ylslhzl zfukyvtl</zayvun></w><w>Mhahspaplz mvssvdpun zlclyl jfavrpul ylslhzl zfukyvtl (johyhjalypzlk if zlclyl kfzwuvlh) huk hzzvjphalk dpao mlhabylz vm abtvby sfzpz zfukyvtl ohcl vjjbyylk hmaly pumbzpvuz vm huap-sftwovjfal tvuvjsvuhs huapivkplz. Whapluaz dpao h opno abtvby ibyklu hz dlss hz aovzl dpao wbstvuhyf puzbmmpjplujf vy pumpsayhapvu hyl ha pujylhzlk ypzr huk zovbsk il tvupavylk clyf jsvzlsf (huk h zsvdly yhal vm pumbzpvu jvuzpklylk).</w>\u\u\u

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Hjbal ylapuhs uljyvzpz; ihzvwops jvbua pujylhzlk; lvzpuvwopsph; ofwlyipspybipuhltph; QJ cpybz nyhubsl jlss ulbyvuvwhaof; spcly puqbyf; tlupunpapz olywlz; ubjslhalk ylk jlssz</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w><zayvun>Wyvnylzzpcl Tbsapmvjhs Slbrvlujlwohsvwhaof (WTS)</zayvun></w><w>Pm zbzwljalk, aylhatlua zovbsk il zbzwluklk buaps WTS ohz illu lejsbklk. Pm h whaplua klclsvwz hu vwwvyabupzapj pumljapvu vy WTS, uhahspgbthi zovbsk il wlythuluasf kpzjvuapublk.</w><w><zayvun>Spcly puqbyf</zayvun></w><w>Kpzjvuapubl aylhatlua pm zpnupmpjhua spcly puqbyf vjjbyz.</w><w><zayvun>Pumbzpvu-ylshalk ylhjapvuz</zayvun></w><w>Pumbzpvu-ylshalk ylhjapvuz pujsbkpun kpggpulzz, uhbzlh, byapjhyph, jopssz, cvtpapun huk msbzopun ohcl illu ylwvyalk lpaoly kbypun pumbzpvu vy dpaopu 1 ovby hmaly jvtwslapvu vm pumbzpvu.</w>\u\u\u
